collectible.title: Ferri-chan's Collar
collectible.subtitle: A duplicate of Felix's collar. It jingles when you walk!
collectible.text: The cute collar that Felix wears. If you wear it, he might compliment it—even if it means feeding his own ego—and might even flirt with people who aren't straight or lesbian!

collectible.title: A gift from Felix and Mari S.
collectible.subtitle: Something you can remember your time with them by.
collectible.text: "I've had lots of fun with you, ~Player~! You should play with Mari and I again!"
collectible.unlock: Make Felix and Mari both lose. You must be male. Winner does not matter.
